posts.name: Pete Walters
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.58 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • This update improves the layout of media messages with quoted replies, and also fixes a visual gap that appeared between the search bar and your chat list when the “Reduce Transparency” iOS Accessibility setting was enabled.

Let us know about any issues you experience! Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.57 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.58.0.760-beta

42 new commits since 7.57.0.755-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.58 [1]

  • Rebuild GroupMessageProcessor types [2]

  • Un-SDS-ify IncomingGroupsV2MessageJob [3]

  • Add BackupAttachmentDownloadQueueStatusManager [4]

  • Remove unused code [5]

  • Allow resetting the chosen restore method during registration. [6]

  • Remove some debug-only Promise code [7]

  • Don’t fetch profiles during Storage Service merges [8]

  • Add serverTimestamp for debugging [9]

  • Fetch group message jobs in the write transaction [10]

  • Don’t consult read caches when updating dbCopy [11]

  • Clean up ModelReadCaches [12]

  • Use profile names from Storage Service [13]

  • Fix group message processor error handling [14]

  • Fix logic for forced credential refreshes [15]

  • Enable extendedLayoutIncludesOpaqueBars for the ChatList [16]

  • Remove extraneous site that also sets extendedLayoutIncludesOpaqueBars [17]

  • Update to LibSignal v0.70.1 [18]

  • Allow interacting with messages in 'sending' state. [19]

  • Update the revision when requesting to join [20]

  • Add workaround to InMemoryDB for Xcode 16.3 previews [21]

  • Reconfigure init of BackupSettings previews [22]

  • Skip bottom margin for CVComponentMessage if bodyMedia is present, like bodyText [23]

  • Update Quick Restore QR codes [24]

  • Be more permissive about when we'll try and insert a mention [25]

  • Use Preconditions for waitForFetchingAndProcessing [26]

  • Refresh expiration banner when entering foreground [27]

  • Post a beta error if we can’t parse our UD cert [28]

  • Fix Storage Service failures after re-registering [29]

  • Reset dm timer version when a linked device becomes delinked [30]

  • Use Retry.performWithBackoff for megaphones [31]

  • Update default value for maxAverageBackoff [32]

  • Don’t notify when requesting to join a group [33]

  • Remove side effects when fetching group links [34]

  • Handle group joins based on expected outcome [35]

  • Remove FeatureFlags.enableAccountEntropyPool [36]

  • Remove a transport exception [37]

  • Make InMemoryDB workaround for Previews implicit [38]

  • Update release notes [39]

  • Update translations [40]

  • Make SVR backup after AEP migration more durable [41]

  • Don't initialize backup attachment download progress outside the main app [42]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.57.0.755-beta…7.58.0.760-beta

Localization changes for the release are the same, as this is the first build of the release.

IMG_17041179×1113 85 KB

Now that it’s possible to use Private Access via the native photo picker, this permission request and the large space it occupies can be removed. I think the best look would be to just show the categories at the bottom.

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.60 release

posts.cooked: Additionally, please consider including the Add Photos Only permission selection so the user doesn’t have to constantly grant Limited Access just to save photos. Details here

link_counts.title: Support for Photo Picker Private Access

posts.name: Delamcode
posts.cooked:
Just had a bug related to the green photo bug, where it seems if an image is small enough, it doesn’t open the photo editor? I tested this by taking a screenshot, making it the minimum size (grab the corner and crop to smallest size), and did the copy&delete shortcut. Once it worked correctly, once it did the green square (which is seemingly not fixable) and once sent without user input.
Should I instead report this kind of thing to a GitHub issue?
Edit: Found the GitHub issue, happy to hear it’s being fixed (Pasting a cropped or small image skips image preview and sends immediately · Issue #6013 · signalapp/Signal-iOS · GitHub if anyone’s curious)

link_counts.title: Pasting a cropped or small image skips image preview and sends immediately · Issue #6013 · signalapp/Signal-iOS · GitHub

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked: Thanks for the suggestion – I’ll track this internally!

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked: Yes, that’s a known issue we’re already tracking internally. Thanks for reporting!

That was fast! I see you guys just made this change in the production version with 7.57.1. Thank you for the responsiveness.
Edit: Ok, unfortunately it still needs to be tweaked. While the selection appears in device settings and can be chosen, the app still requests library access when trying to save a photo. Specifically, this occurs when tapping the photo and then the three-dot menu in the top right on iPhone. If I use the bottom left share icon and then hit save, there is no issue.

New Version: 7.58.0.770-beta

6 new commits since 7.58.0.760-beta:

  • Revert changes to Chat List extended layout [1]

  • setUpLocalIdentifiers should check for deregistered instances [2]

  • Add additional reglock tests, fix a registration edge case. [3]

  • Mark Hello World as unnecessary when reregistering [4]

  • Partially revert "When writing a debug log, repeat logs about the local app state" [5]

  • Update translations [6]

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked:
Couldn’t select attachments error when choosing more than 1 image using the new selector.

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.58.0/7ebb5992477bbcdf5c20cd8cb2cec6cf0a046529eaf5aaf7846a53b037a0a86f.zip

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.59 release.

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.59 release

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked:
Looks like there was an image format in there that we don’t handle:

2025/05/09 18:18:22:554 WRN🧡 [SendMediaNavigationController.swift:538 showApprovalAfterProcessingAnyMediaLibrarySelections(picker:)]: failed to prepare attachments. error: Error Domain=NSItemProviderErrorDomain Code=-1000 “Cannot load representation of type com.adobe.raw-image” UserInfo={NSLocalizedDescription=Cannot load representation of type com.adobe.raw-image, NSUnderlyingError=0x11a6f8000 {Error Domain=NSItemProviderErrorDomain Code=-1000 “No loader block available for type com.adobe.raw-image.” UserInfo={NSLocalizedDescription=No loader block available for type com.adobe.raw-image.}}}

Thanks for reporting, we’ll take a look!
